ns2:testcase.ns3:title: RRZ-LON-70001-178-Revolving LOC Statement : Positive Scenario / Account Extract / Owner / Default Distribution / Address selection / Product 2226-0008 with associated sub-loans / Standing order / Coll 60-Residential RE-Structure-Form H
ns2:testcase.ns3:description: Verify that the Account extract is created for the primary customer [RSZ section 3.1.4(2(1c), 2b, 3, 4, 5,6(1), 6a, 7a, 13), RSZ 3.1.8 record layout(Record 12.2 tab, Record MA tab, Record MCDL tab, Record MIDL tab, Record MISL tab, Record MSDL tab, Record MSTL tab, Record M1HL tab, Record M1DL tab, Record M1FC tab, Record M1FT tab, Record M1IC tab, Record M1IT tab, Record MGSD tab), RRZ Section (12.1,12.2, 12.3, 12.4.2, 12.5.2, 12.5.3, 12.6.2, 12.6.3, 12.7.2, 12.7.3, 12.7.4, 12.7.5, 12.7.6, 12.7.7, 12.8.2)]
ns2:testcase.ns3:creator: v003686

ns2:relatedChangeRequest.summary: 17816: RRZ-LON-70001-184-Revolving LOC Statement : M1 Record Number, Transaction Description, Transaction Amount, Bank Balance data is not correct for some M1DL Record
18312: RRZ-LON-70001-173-Revolving LOC Statement : Populated Total Principal Advances/Charges data is not correct for MSTL record layout
18793: RRZ-LON-70001-172-Revolving LOC Statement : Populated field data is not correct for MSDL record layout for master and sub loan
18794: RRZ-LON-70001-172-Revolving LOC Statement : Annual percentage rate is not populated for sub loan in the M1HL record layout
18127: RRZ-LON-70001-100-Revolving LOC Statement : Populated data is not correct for M1IC record type for some accounts
18698: RRZ-LON-70001-176-Revolving LOC Statement : Populated Minimum amount due data is not correct for MCDL
17818: RRZ-LON-70001-184-Revolving LOC Statement : M1FC Record Number, Effective date, Post date, Transaction description, Transaction amount data is not correct for some M1FC Record

tag0:div.tag0:p: Use migrated data or create test data that satisfies the setup for the requirements below:

tag0:li.tag0:p: Loan product should be 2226-0008 with associated sub-loans and standing order has been setup.
Collateral should be linked with Loan product and collateral type should be "60: Residential RE-Structure". (Bankruptcy Message Indicator(O6="R"))
Generate statement on the same date when the billing record is generated.
Loan account should not be "Closed", "Purged", OR "Charged off".
Loan account should not be in "22-Settled", "27-Transferred to Recovery" OR "40-Finally Settled"
Collateral status should not be in "30: Foreclosure in Process" OR "31:Foreclosure sale to third party"

Loan group should be consumer
Update as of September 13, 2016: As per CR 832, the RSZ document (Lot 13) section 3.1.8 (embedded spreadsheet tab 12.2) was updated with a new field 'Shortage of Payment Due'. This is a derived field that should be populated as 'Amount of scheduled payment going toward satisfying the amount due' Minus (-) 'Auto payment client has elected'. Data for this field should have a start position of 834, character length should be 20, and format should be X(20).
